competitive_info:
{
  "competitors": [
    {
      "name": "WalkMe",
      "pros": [
        "Simplifies the onboarding process for new users",
        "Provides step-by-step guidance for complex software or platforms",
        "Good customer service and onboarding",
        "Customization and branding within application is possible",
        "Ease of customer self-onboarding",
        "Great analytics on platform, usage and adoption by users, and surveys",
        "Very friendly customer support"
      ],
      "cons": [
        "Requires heavy lifting to set up and maintain",
        "Lack of tracking analytics",
        "Drag-and-drop editor can be limited for non-technical users"
      ],
      "differentiators": [
        "Advanced digital adoption platform",
        "Streamlines user onboarding and reduces churn",
        "Provides a good UX to build and design walkthroughs and announcements"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Pendo",
      "pros": [
        "Easy to use for enterprise software",
        "Helps increase product adoption through improved communication methods",
        "Manage and analyze user behavior",
        "Provides visual data representation and streamlined surveys",
        "Consolidated platform with metrics-first approach"
      ],
      "cons": [
        "Limited onboarding UX elements",
        "Requires standard web apps, may not work well with non-standard apps"
      ],
      "differentiators": [
        "Adoption tool for analyzing user in-app behavior",
        "Collects feedback and builds onboarding flows",
        "Provides a consolidated platform for digital adoption"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Appcues",
      "pros": [
        "Easy to use and set up",
        "Provides valuable data-driven insights",
        "Allows for easy creation of multiple guides",
        "Intuitive UI and UX",
        "Simple setup",
        "Great customer service"
      ],
      "cons": [
        "Poor element detection",
        "Challenges with customizing some flows",
        "Issue with styling future modal windows and tooltips"
      ],
      "differentiators": [
        "No-code platform for user onboarding and engagement",
        "Good analytics",
        "Supports onboarding, feature adoption, engagement and more"
      ]
    }
  ]
}

roi_feature_map:
{
  "resolving_features": [
    "Digital Adoption Platform",
    "In-App Guidance",
    "Analytics",
    "Customized Pricing Plans",
    "Implementation and Integration",
    "Ongoing Support and Training"
  ],
  "details": "Whatfix's Digital Adoption Platform provides a return on investment for Infosys by improving the efficiency of their energy management processes, reducing their carbon footprint, and improving their overall sustainability. The In-App Guidance feature provides personalized onboarding experiences for employees and customers, reducing the time and resources wasted on ineffective traditional training methods. The Analytics feature provides insights to improve user experience, enabling Infosys to track user behavior and adoption, and make data-driven decisions. The Customized Pricing Plans ensure that Infosys only pays for what they need, aligning with their goals of reducing costs and improving productivity. The Implementation and Integration feature ensures a smooth transition to the platform, minimizing disruptions to their business operations. Finally, the Ongoing Support and Training feature ensures that Infosys gets the most out of the platform, providing continuous support and training to address any challenges that may arise."
}
